title: Reksai passive need a nerf against stealth champions!!
body:
Rek sais passive on her W atm can detect stealth champions....this is need to be removed because if you play eve you already have your own passive that you have to check in order to no get reveal we dont need a champion with 1500 range anti stealth mechanic !!

Remove rek sai ability to detect stealth champs with her W passive thanks!

replies.body:
noob

jk
No but seriously, 
It's called a counter mechanic? and I think it's very cool.
